REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2445 reute d f BC-<GLOBAL-MOTORS>-TO-MA 10-19 0094

TEXT.TITLE: <GLOBAL MOTORS> TO MARKET INDONESIAN VEHICLES
TEXT.BODY: Global Motors Inc said it has agreed to become become the exclusive North American importer of the Lincan Gama, a four-wheel-drive sport vehicle manufactured by <P.T. Indauda> of Indonesia. In a letter of intent it signed with P.T. Indauda, Global said it expects to begin marketing the first Lincan Gamas in mid-1989, with 20,000 units projected to be marketed in the first year. Global is the parent company of Yugo America Inc, importer of the Yugoslavian Yugo vehicle. Reuter
